(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Advertorial)))


root(ROOT-0, Advertorial-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN WHO))
    (VP (VBZ defines)
      (NP
        (NP (NNP Probiotics))
        (PP (IN as) (`` ``)
          (NP
            (NP (JJ Live) (NNS microorganisms))
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WDT which))
              (S
                (PRN
                  (SBAR
                    (WHADVP (WRB when))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBN administered)
                        (PP (IN in)
                          (NP (JJ adequate) (NNS amounts)))))))
                (VP (VB confer)
                  (NP (DT a) (NN health) (NN benefit))
                  (PP (IN on)
                    (NP (DT the) (NN host)))))))
          ('' ''))))
    (. .)))


det(WHO-2, The-1)
nsubj(defines-3, WHO-2)
root(ROOT-0, defines-3)
dobj(defines-3, Probiotics-4)
prep(Probiotics-4, as-5)
amod(microorganisms-8, Live-7)
pobj(as-5, microorganisms-8)
nsubj(confer-15, which-9)
advmod(administered-11, when-10)
parataxis(confer-15, administered-11)
prep(administered-11, in-12)
amod(amounts-14, adequate-13)
pobj(in-12, amounts-14)
rcmod(microorganisms-8, confer-15)
det(benefit-18, a-16)
nn(benefit-18, health-17)
dobj(confer-15, benefit-18)
prep(confer-15, on-19)
det(host-21, the-20)
pobj(on-19, host-21)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN Unless)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP
            (VP (VBG living)
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (DT a) (NN mountain))))
            (CC and)
            (VP (VBG hiding)
              (PP (IN under)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN shell))
                  (-LRB- -LRB-)
                  (NP (NNP ie) (NNP Sua) (NNP Gu))
                  (: -))))))))))

              (NP (NN residence))
              (ADVP (RB there)))))))
    (. .)))

  (S (CC But)
    (NP (PRP it))
    (VP (VBD was) (RB n't)

        (NP (DT the) (JJ 20th) (NN century)))

        (S
          (NP
            (NP (DT a) (JJ Russian) (NN Scientist))

                (NP (DT the) (NN name))

                (NP (PRP it))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR
      (WHNP (WP what))
      (S
        (NP (DT that) (NNS means))
        (VP (VBZ is)
          (SBAR (IN that)
            (S
              (NP (NNP Probiotics))
              (VP (MD may) (RB not)
                (ADVP (RB yet))
                (VP (VB be)
                  (NP (DT a) (JJ sure) (NN cure))
                  (PP (IN for)
                    (NP (PDT all) (DT these) (NNS ailments)))
                  (, ,))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)
dobj(is-5, what-2)
det(means-4, that-3)
nsubj(is-5, means-4)
dep(So-1, is-5)

aux(cure-14, may-8)
neg(cure-14, not-9)
advmod(cure-14, yet-10)
cop(cure-14, be-11)
det(cure-14, a-12)
amod(cure-14, sure-13)
ccomp(is-5, cure-14)
prep(cure-14, for-15)
predet(ailments-18, all-16)
det(ailments-18, these-17)
pobj(for-15, ailments-18)

    (NP (EX there))
    (ADVP (RB sure))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT no) (NN harm))
        (VP (VBG trying))))
    (. !)))

  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT A) (NN lot))

              (NP (NNS parents))

                  (NP (NNS kids)))))))))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP VITAGEN))
    (VP (VBZ has)
      (NP
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (JJ extra) (NN addition))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (NNP Prebiotics))))
        (CONJP (RB as) (RB well) (IN as))
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN benefit))
          (PP (IN of)
            (S
              (VP (VBG having)
                (NP (JJR less) (NN sugar))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (IN So) (RB so))
    (VP (VB make)
      (NP (DT an) (JJ informed) (NN decision))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (VP (VBG choosing)
            (SBAR
              (WHNP (WP what))
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB buy)))))))))
    (. .)))
